Description: ***PLEASE READ BEFORE BIDDING*** Your complete satisfaction is of utmost importance, and we strive to offer the very best buying experience possible. If on the remote chance there is a problem, please contact us before leaving feedback and we will be more than willing to work with you to resolve it. We hope you are pleased with your purchase and will come back again! We are a pawn shop, not a music store, and so have limited knowledge of guitars. We describe and check every instrument as thoroughly as we can. Customer satisfaction is our main concern, so please contact us immediately if there are any problems. Description One the most amazing looking guitars I have come across in beautiful purple wave with mother of pearl inlay fully wrapping around the body and neck! This a limited edition V type series EXP made by Peavy! Absolutely stunning pictures can not do this guitar justice! Comes in a hard case made by Gator cases. Very few of the v types out there and this the only one in this color I could find for sale at the moment. This guitar is almost flawless. There is a couple of very lite scuffs on the back probably from playing it. The front, neck, sides and everywhere else is perfect. Nicest one on the market right now for sure! Good luck and happy bidding!!!
Title: Peavy V Type Series EXP Electric Guitar Purple Mother Of Pearl Limited Edition
